N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7404.3 - Policies and procedures

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with the requirements of this Part, OCFS shall develop written
policies and procedures that govern security and supervision for each secure
facility. Such policies and procedures shall include, but not be limited to: (1)
supervision of residents in facility
living areas; (2)
supervision of
residents outside facility living areas; (3)
records of supervision; (4)
requirements of staff prior to assuming
responsibilities in an assigned facility area; (5)
contraband; (6)
use of physical force and mechanical
restraints; (7)
resident population
counts; (8)
transport of
residents; (9)
firearms
control; (10)
key
control; (11)
locks and other
security devices; (12)
tool and
equipment control; and
(13)
perimeter control. (b) These policies and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as
needed. Notes
